meanings.definition: The place or source of origin or earliest known history of something.
meanings.sent1: The proveniences of the ancient artifact were traced back to a small village.
meanings.sent2: Archaeologists study the proveniences of artifacts to understand their history.
meanings.sent3: The proveniences of the lost treasure led to a surprising discovery.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the protagonist's proveniences were shrouded in mystery.
meanings.sent5: The proveniences of the rare gemstone were revealed through careful research.

meanings.definition: The history or record of the ownership or location of an object or archaeological site.
meanings.sent1: The proveniences of the painting showed it had changed hands many times.
meanings.sent2: Museum curators carefully document the proveniences of each artifact.
meanings.sent3: The proveniences of the ancient vase were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: The proveniences of the old map revealed a hidden path to treasure.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the proveniences of the fossil helped scientists piece together its journey.
